neutral: Aye, I’ve your headlights. Found ‘em in the ditch.
If you want them back, you’ll have to wait—I’m busy.
Roads are rough out here. You’ll lose more than headlights if you’re not careful.
angry: Don’t be shoutin’—I said I HAVE them!
You’re lucky I picked them up at all!
happy: Right, I’ll fit them for ya if you want.
Grand to see someone takin’ care of their motor.
Here you go—good as new! Well… good as Cavan new.
